lines.text: That you exist. That you're here. Living is wonderful. You must be aware at any minute that you live. That now the sun's setting. That there are waves on the sea. That a dog barks. That a horse gallops far away. That we're together. That it doesn't matter what happens tomorrow, cause we will still be together. That our senses exist. That they are awake. That we see, hear, taste.
. Can you hear that? They sound like drums.
The church bells. Flocks... Yokes... There's life everywhere, Sebastian. And love too, the same in an old olive tree than in a small flower. And everywhere, there we are.
No, cause it brings bad luck!
